body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Car Dealership. My name is Christopher Henderson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Christopher, my name is Michelle Edwards.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. Could you please provide me with your phone number so we can follow up with you? Please speak it out digit by digit.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Michelle. In order to assist you better, may I also have your email address? Please spell it out slowly for me.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's M as in Mary, I as in India, C as in Charlie, H as in Henry, E as in Echo, L as in Lima, L as in Lima, E as in Echo, at symbol, G as in Golf, M as in Mary, A as in Alpha, I as in India, L as in Lima, dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Michelle. We will reach out to you shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you for your help, Christopher.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
